metadataAttributes.Title: CAM and Design Manufacturing for Mechanical Engineers with Autodesk Fusion 360
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: With design for manufacturing, our design process focused on the design over its cost, but always keeping in mind how parts needed to be made. With manufacturing at the core of a design, we're able to fix potential problems in the design phase rather than after production. In many cases, the end product is made up of an assembly of different pieces to simplify manufacturing or to achieve specific design goals. Each piece represents a certain tolerance and put together, things might not work or fit if they weren’t accounted for in the design.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Computer-Aided Design (CAD),Computer-Aided Manufacturing,Design for manufacturing,CAM,Mechanical Engineering,
